GSD.product_version: versions from v3.13 to before v5.10.121
GSD.description:
ext4: fix bug_on in __es_tree_search

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.121 by commit 4fd58b5cf118d2d9038a0b8c9cc0e43096297686, it was introduced in version v3.13 by commit 5946d089379a35dda0e531710b48fca05446a196. For more details please see the references link.
